entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Update jquery-validation-unobtrusive dependency #42904
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, mvc #42903
  • [Blazor] Using the `<Navigating>` parameter in the Router causes a re-render of all components of the Layout on navigation #42902
  • using httprequest pipereader in a custom middleware to read request body #42900
  • Maximum number of WebSocket connections caps at 10 #42898
  • Missing information about ASP.NET Core worker process recycling requirements and setup options on GNU/Linux servers #42897
    .NET 8 Planning
  • ANCM should forward the mapped Identity instead of the client certificate after IIS Client Cert Mapping Auth #42896
  • [Blazor] Make IsKnownImmutableType return true for enum #42891
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Use Blazor as Web Components in JS (to progressively migrate to blazor) #42890
  • Is there a way to drag diagram to design via blazor? #42889
  • The SPA default page middleware could not return the default page '/index.html' because it was not found, and no other middleware handled the request. #42888

Closed

  • Intermittent ObjectDisposedException in SPA Hosting #42608
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, updates #42886
  • blazor webassembly project can't run in .net7 #42421
  • blazor: using open/close region vs passing int sequence numbers to component creator method #42870
  • Can't debug Blazor WASM? Used to work, now doesn't, Net 6.0.302/6.0.7 and VS 17.2.6 #42899
  • [Blazor] Question: can i call .net static methods in afterStarted of JavaScript initializers? #42892
  • .net 7 preview 4 Using mudblazor 6.0.10 #41932
    7.0-rc1
  • Multiple @Body(RenderFragment or sections) in blazor #42880
  • Publishing Blazor Linux creates SHA-256 failures #42633

PullRequests

Created

  • Update SDK #42907
    area-infrastructure
  • [SignalR][TS client] Send ping on connection start #42905
    area-signalr, signalr-client-javascript
  • Fix the IsKnownImmutableType method to return true for enum types #42901
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `bea621c` to `7735334` #42894
    area-infrastructure
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `960bb9a` to `7aa1fe7` #42893
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • HTTP/3: Avoid per-request cancellation token allocations #42685
    area-runtime
  • Fix UsePathBase with WAB #42876
    area-runtime
  • Add Description to OpenApiResponseBody #42872
    area-web-frameworks
  • Introduce per-HealthCheck Delay and Periodicity #42646
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Split Blazor WASM Auth Tests to New Project #42879
    area-mvc, 7.0-rc1
  • Allowing `nullable struct` with `AsParameters` attribute #42812
    area-web-frameworks
  • Fix the code to ignore parameters from incorrect locations #42878
    area-web-frameworks
  • test install-scripts #40061
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
